title: Fossil Free London stages mock profits party in protest of Shell quarterly earnings announcement
description: CLIMATE activists have staged a mock profits party outside Shell’s London headquarters in protest against the oil giant raking in billions of pounds from fossil fuels last year.Fossil Free London’s demonstration took place in the City of London on Wednesday as the company publised its final quarterly profits for 2025.Despite a downturn in its performance last year, widely thought to be the result of falling oil prices, the firm still made billions of pounds, with shareholders receiving a 4 per cent increase in dividends and £3.5 billion in share buybacks.

title: This Ancient Cave Was Sealed Away for 40,000 Years, Here's What Archaeologists Found Inside
description: A cave locked away in Gibraltar for thousands of years has just been opened. What archaeologists found inside is so remarkable, it could shift the entire narrative of human evolution.

title: Greenpeace slams fossil fuel sponsors for Winter Olympics
description: Greenpeace activists staged a protest in Milan on Thursday against the sponsorship of the Milan-Cortina Olympics by energy giant Eni, warning that fossil fuel emissions were threatening the viability of winter sports.
